name: Tetris 2D: The Great Lookin for Blocks
name_original: Tetris 2D: The Great Lookin for Blocks
description: ~ GAME BETA 1.4.5 ~ The game was beta version. Please Input the cards you choose. An simply have free to play! CARDS TO INSERT: TETRICARD 6R INPUTER Please insert to card to play a game Make a Great Day! Also you can clone those tetriminos and put it until you get cutten! (USE GRID TO CUT) Enjoy the game! Made with Algodoo Inspried by Tetris Game Series.
